statements: UPDATE CampaignAnalysis SET awareness_raised = TRUE WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE CampaignAnalysis SET impact_on_sales = 7500.00, campaign_end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 2;

UPDATE CampaignAnalysis SET awareness_raised = FALSE, impact_on_sales = 2000.50 WHERE campaign_id = 456
UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET marketing_channel = 'Social Media' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET campaign_end_date = '2022-12-31', campaign_name = 'End of Year Sale' WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET campaign_name = 'New Summer Campaign', campaign_end_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE campaign_id = 100
UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET marketing_channel = 'Social Media', campaign_start_date = '2022-07-01', campaign_end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 200
UPDATE impact_analysis SET impact_level = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Good experience!' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE impact_analysis SET impact_level = 2, promotion_channel = 'Social Media' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great campaign, keep it up!', feedback_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE user_id = 101 AND campaign_id = 5;
UPDATE Campaigns SET budget = 5000 WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE CampaignMetrics SET clicks = 100, impressions = 500 WHERE metric_id = 201;
UPDATE Campaigns SET budget = 10000 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE MarketingChannels SET audience_size = 50000, channel_name = 'Social Media' WHERE channel_id = 2;
UPDATE campaign_data SET budget = 15000.00, target_audience = 'young adults' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE product_data SET price = 29.99, material = 'cotton' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE campaign_data SET budget = 1500.00, target_audience = 'Male' WHERE campaign_id = 101
